title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 17.5 - Transfer of patients admitted in accordance with section 31.39 of the mental hygiene law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 17.5 - Transfer of patients admitted in accordance with section 31.39 of the mental hygiene law

State Regulations
(a) A patient
admitted to a hospital in accordance with section 31.39 of the Mental Hygiene

Law may be admitted to another hospital pursuant to the provisions governing
involuntary admission on application supported by medical certification without
the necessity of obtaining an order of transfer. (b) No patient shall be transferred from one
hospital to another as described in subdivision (a) of this section unless the

Mental Health Information Service is provided with prior notice of the proposed
movement. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
17.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
